title: Whispers and the Roars
description: When my eyes are closed, the monster can’t ever see me.When I sing a song in my head, the monster can’t ever hear me.When I pretend my bedroom is a playground where I play hide and seek, the monster can’t ever find me.The darkness should frighten me.I should worry I’ll find more monsters…monsters scarier than him.But I’m not afraid.It’s safe here.When I’m inside of my head…He. Can’t. Ever. Touch. Me.
author: K. Webster
